summary: A group of radio speakers go around France on a bus tour to reach the audience they lost.
cast: Manu Payet|Clovis Cornillac|Douglas Attal|Pascal Demolon|Benjamin Lavernhe|Côme Levin|Zita Hanrot|Sam Karmann|Jacky Ido|Juliette Plumecocq-Mech|Ana Girardot|Laurent Bateau|Anthony Sonigo|Daniel Cohen|Mona Walravens|Marie Lenoir|Alice Belaïdi|Jean-Claude Hadida|Eric Wapler|Michel Vivier|Sébastien Cierco|Jerome Palacios|Jean-Louis Barcelona|Vincent Darmuzey|Timothée Augendre|Geoffroy Degouy|Dora Sellier|Pom Klementieff|Jean-Claude Welche|Margaux Noël|Mathieu Oullion|Kamal Mogne|Julien Prévost|Anne Arovas|Hervé Laudière|Ivan Le Goff|Marty Oullion|Xavier Bonadonna|Bénédicte-Lala Ernoult|Claire Guillon|Big John
title: Radiostars
